title: Wicked Game
description: Sarah is a security software engineer who works remotely, and she’s house-sitting in Los Angeles.David and Aiden are her temporary neighbors, a hot couple, and an enigma.They’re going to invite her in their relationship, blow her mind in bed, and play a mean game that’s going to have her question everything about these two guys, and her role in this.Is David actually the comforting sweet guy she saw in the beginning? Is the cool and aloof Aiden actually the ‘bad guy’ of the couple? Is their dynamic as wholesome as it seems? Is this just a wicked game they’re playing? Who’s the Master of the game? And what’s the purpose of the game?The book contains MMF, MM, and MF sex, angst, love, and a lot of smut with dirty talk and BDSM.Mention of child physical abuse only in the backstory.It’s a standalone.
author: Jane  Lee
